full_summary:
================================

### Government Tender Announcement

**Title and Reference Number**

* Title: SSC Motio Maintenance for IRCC
* Reference Number: SSC-24-00025395: T

**Amendment and Tender Status**

* Amendment Number: 2
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-02-13T14:00:00 (Expired Tender)

### Solicitation Description

This solicitation is for the purchase of a Motio Maintenance solution, including technical specifications. Interested suppliers can register in the SSC P2P portal to access this and other solicitations.

### Supplier Registration

To register, please visit the SSC P2P portal at [Supplier-Fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and click "Register Now".

### Tender Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| GSIN | N7030AG - COMPUTER SOFTWARE, OFFICE AUTOMATION, DOCUMENT MANAGEMENT, MAIL, NETWORKS, PUBLISHING, SPREADSHEETS, TYPESETTING, WORD PROCESSING - MICROCOMPUTERS ONLY (English) |
| GSIN Description (French) | Logiciel, bureautique, gestion de documents, courrier gestion, de réseaux, édition, tableurs, composition, traitement de texte - micro-ordinateurs seulement |
| UNSPSC | None |
| Procurement Category | General Services (GD) |
| Tender Notice Type | Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner) |

### Contact Information

* Name: Cory Dingwall (Admin)
* Email: None
* Phone: 6136082355
* Fax: 6136082355
* Address: 427 Office 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario K2P 2H8, Canada

### Attachments

Please visit the SSC P2P portal at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) to access the tender description attachments.
